Invalid Primary Diagnosis: 1. Primary Diagnosis doesn't exist or 2. Primary Diagnosis Blank or 3. Diagnosis can't be used at primary position
Poorly Coded Primary Diagnosis: Diagnosis exists and valid at primary position. But they are so unspecific and the resource use can't be defined.
Diagnosis conflicting with anatomical sites: The anatomical site specified at the 5th digit level conflicts with the diagnosis in the record.
